titleStmt.title: Samuel G. Suddarth, Receipt to John Haly
CWG13662

availability.p: This image and transcription is publicly accessible. The image appears courtesy of the repository named in the Source Description. The transcription and annotation were undertaken by Kentucky Historical Society staff, volunteers, and interns. If referencing this document title, accession number, and permanent URL.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition
Early Access

msIdentifier.idno: QMG Box 11; Bundles of AG & QMG Expenditures 1864-65; Bundle 1

body.p:
NO. 12.
The State of Kentucky,
To John Haly, Dr.

row.cell: To. Gray. &. Saffield bills for Calicos Thread &c
" J. R. Graham bill for Lamps

body.p: I certify that the above account is correct and just, and that the articles were furnished as stated, and were necessary for the public service.

I. R. Hutchinson
Acting Surgeon Quarter-Master Gen. of Ky.

Received at Frankfort, Kentucky, the 22 of March, 1864, of S. G. SUDDARTH, Quarter=Master General of the State of Kentucky, the sum of One hundred & five dollars and fifty four cents, in full of the above account.
(DUPLICATE.)

42
No. 12.
No 52 Abstract. G
Jno Haly
Dollars 105.54/100
Paid Mch 22 1864.
arsenal
Hospital
